welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Growth assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.hello: Hi there! How can I assist you with our digital services?
responses.services: We offer web development, digital marketing, AI solutions, and more!
responses.contact: You can reach us at contact@growth.com or call +1 (555) 123-4567
responses.default: I'm here to help! Please ask about our services, contact info, or anything else.
